column4: at school there is no password (registered MAC address) and it just kept trying to join and joint
bullgard: is there any way to undo the updates that happened today?
wow .. so the updates broke the #1 thing I need in my computer and now my only option is .. reinstall everything? I mean, what would you do?

Personally, I would try to find out specifically which package it is that broke the mouse. Via asking in forums etc., and then I'd uninstall that package and reinstall (Or reinstall a previous version)
